file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
x-generator: NSwag v13.13.2.0 (NJsonSchema v10.5.2.0 (Newtonsoft.Json v12.0.0.0))
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Icelandic Health Insurance (IHI) - Island.is
  description: Webservices for the X-Road serveces for Island.is
  contact:
    name: Icelandic Health Insurance (IHI)
    url: https://sjukra.is
    email: hjalp@sjukra.is
  version: v1
  x-category:
    - health
  x-pricing:
    - free
  x-links:
    documentation: https://sjukra.is
    responsibleParty: https://www.sjukra.is/um-okkur
    bugReport: https://www.sjukra.is/um-okkur/thjonustuleidir
    featureRequest: https://sjukra.is
servers:
  - url: https://dev-innrisirestws.sjukra.is/islandrg
paths:
  /v1/document:
    post:
      tags:
        - Document
      summary: Post function for invoices. This function creates new document in IHI systems.
      operationId: Document_Post
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
      requestBody:
        x-name: document
        description: Instance of Document witch includes a XML string representing the actual document.
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Document'
        required: true
        x-position: 2
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 'Returns instance of DocumentType. '
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '412':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentType'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/document/{ihiDocumentID}/documentattachment:
    post:
      tags:
        - Document
      summary: Post function for attachment.
      operationId: Document_DocumentAttachment
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
        - name: ihiDocumentID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique ID of document in IHI systems. ( Einkvæmt skjalanúmer úr kerfum SÍ )
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
          x-position: 2
      requestBody:
        x-name: attachment
        description: Body parameter of type DocumentAttachment. Includes attachment type, title and the attachment content as a base64 string
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentAttachment'
        required: true
        x-position: 3
      responses:
        '201':
          description: 'Returns instance of DocumentType. '
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentAttachmentType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/document/{ihiDocumentID}/getaccidentstatus:
    get:
      tags:
        - Document
      summary: 'Service returns the status of certain accident report. '
      operationId: Document_GetAccidentStatus
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
        - name: ihiDocumentID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique ID of document in IHI systems. ( Einkvæmt skjalanúmer úr kerfum SÍ )
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Returns instance of GetAccidentStatusType. Includes the unique id from ihi systems, status of the report ( In progress, wait for attachments, etc.), status of the attachemts and conformations.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetAccidentStatusType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/document/{ihiDocumentID}/sendconfirmation:
    post:
      tags:
        - Document
      operationId: Document_SendConfirmation
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
        - name: ihiDocumentID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Unique ID of document in IHI systems. ( Einkvæmt skjalanúmer úr kerfum SÍ )
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
          x-position: 2
      requestBody:
        x-name: confirmation
        description: Instance of the  ConfirmationIN class. Has information about the confirmationParty, confirmationType and objection text if confirmationType = 2 (Objection)
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmationIN'
        required: true
        x-position: 3
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Returns unique id of the request as NumberIHI
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/person/{nationalID}/ishealthinsured/{date}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Person
      summary: sefsef
      operationId: Person_IsHealthInsured
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
        - name: nationalID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Person's national ID (Kennitala)
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
        - name: date
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Date to check whether the person is insured on or not.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          x-position: 3
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Returns instance of the IsHealthInsuredType class
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/IsHealthInsuredType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/person/{nationalID}/gethealthinsuranceapplications:
    get:
      tags:
        - Person
      summary: This service returns all the person's health insurance applications.
      operationId: Person_GetHealthInsuranceApplications
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
        - name: nationalID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Person's national ID (Kennitala)
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Returns instance of the GetHealthInsuranceApplicationType
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetHealthInsuranceApplicationType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  /v1/test/ping:
    get:
      tags:
        - Test
      summary: This is a test service to check if the islandrg services are up and running or not.
      operationId: Test_Ping
      parameters:
        - name: authHeader
          in: header
          description: Request header includes UserName, Password and Sender
          schema:
            nullable: true
            oneOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SIRestHeader'
          x-position: 1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Returns instance of the PingType class
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PingType'
        '400':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '401':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '403':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
        '500':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
components:
  schemas:
    DocumentType:
      type: object
      description: 'Return type for Post function in Document service (vistaskjal). '
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        success:
          type: integer
          description: 1 if success, else 0
          format: int32
        errorDesc:
          type: string
          description: Description of the error if any.
          nullable: true
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: Unique ID for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
        ihiDocumentID:
          type: integer
          description: Unique ID of document in IHI systems.
          format: int32
        errorList:
          type: array
          description: 'List of DocumentError class which includes the errors from the database checks if any. '
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/DocumentError'
    DocumentError:
      type: object
      description: |-
        When IHI receives a document, it goes through some checks to see if the document is valid. If it's not valid for some reason, an error will be sent to the sender.
        The document could possibly have more than one error, therefore a list of the DocumentError class will be included in the response.
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        lineNumber:
          type: integer
          description: If the document includes many lines of errors, this indicates for which line error refers to.
          format: int32
        isError:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Yes, 0 = No
          format: int32
        errorType:
          type: string
          description: Indicates which type of error this is.
          nullable: true
        errorDesc:
          type: string
          description: Description of the error.
          nullable: true
    Error:
      type: object
      description: Information about an error.
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - code
        - message
        - errors
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          description: Http status.
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string
          description: Error messages.
          nullable: true
        errors:
          type: array
          description: List of error items.
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorItem'
    ErrorItem:
      type: object
      description: Information about an error item.
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - param
        - message
        - trackingId
      properties:
        param:
          type: string
          description: Name of parameter.
          nullable: true
        code:
          type: integer
          description: Internal error code.
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string
          description: Error message in english.
          nullable: true
        icelandicMessage:
          type: string
          description: Error message in icelandic.
          nullable: true
        trackingId:
          type: string
          description: Internal tracking id of the error.
          nullable: true
        help:
          type: string
          description: Error help message.
          nullable: true
    SIRestHeader:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - userName
        - password
      properties:
        authorization:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        userName:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        password:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        sender:
          type: string
          nullable: true
    Document:
      type: object
      description: An instance of the Document class. Includes type of document and the document itself as XML string.
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        documentType:
          type: integer
          description: Type of document being sent, i.e. 104 for aids, 570 for insurance application and 801 for accident.
          format: int32
        doc:
          type: string
          description: This is the actual document as XML string.
          nullable: true
    DocumentAttachmentType:
      type: object
      description: Return type for attachement Post function
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        success:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Yes, 0 = No
          format: int32
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: Unique ID for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
    DocumentAttachment:
      type: object
      description: One instance of document attachment
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        attachmentType:
          type: integer
          description: Unique number for the type of attachement. This number is unique for each system.
          format: int32
        title:
          type: string
          description: The attachment title
          nullable: true
        attachmentBody:
          type: string
          description: The attachment body in base64 string
          nullable: true
    GetAccidentStatusType:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: Unique number for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
        status:
          type: integer
          description: |-
            Status of the accident notification within IHI. ( Staða tilkynningar hjá Sjúkratryggingum Íslands ) 
            1 = In progress, 2 = In progress - waiting for attachments, 3 = Accepted, 4 = Refused
          format: int32
        attachments:
          type: array
          description: Information list about the attachments. Says whether the attachment has been received and what type it is
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/AttachmentInfo'
        confirmations:
          type: array
          description: Confirmations list. Says whether confirmations has been received or not
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConfirmationInfo'
    AttachmentInfo:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        isReceived:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Attachment has been received by IHI, 0 = Not
          format: int32
        attachmentType:
          type: integer
          description: |-
            Attachment type
            1 = Áverkavottorð, 2 = Umboðsskjal, 3 = Lögregluskýrsla
          format: int32
    ConfirmationInfo:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        isReceived:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Attachment has been received by IHI, 0 = Not
          format: int32
        confirmationType:
          type: integer
          description: |-
            Confirmation type
            1 = Injured or representative party, 2 = Company party
          format: int32
    PingType:
      type: object
      description: Return instance for the Ping service int the Test services.
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: If ping is successful it returns a unique id for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
    ConfirmationIN:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        confirmationParty:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Injured or representative party, 2 = Company party
          format: int32
        confirmationType:
          type: integer
          description: 1 = Confirmation, 2 = Objection
          format: int32
        objection:
          type: string
          description: If conformationType = 2 (Objection), then this is a description text for the objection.
          nullable: true
    IsHealthInsuredType:
      type: object
      description: Return values from the IsHealthInsured (Sjúkratryggdur) service.
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: Unique number for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
        isHealthInsured:
          type: integer
          description: Is person health insured in Iceland? 1 = Yes, 0 = No.
          format: int32
        date:
          type: string
          description: |-
            If person is health insured, this applies to the date when the insurance started.
            If person is not insured, this applies to the date when he was last insured
            If person has always lived in Iceland then this will be empty.        
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        isOnWaitPeriod:
          type: integer
          description: Is person on a 6 month waiting period? 1 = Yes, 0 = No.
          format: int32
    GetHealthInsuranceApplicationType:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        numberIHI:
          type: integer
          description: Unique number for the request from IHI database.
          format: int32
        applications:
          type: array
          description: List of person's health insurance applications in IHI systems
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HealthInsuranceApplication'
    HealthInsuranceApplication:
      type: object
      description: 'Instance of '
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        ihiDocumentID:
          type: number
          description: Unique ID of document in IHI systems.
          format: decimal
        status:
          type: integer
          description: Application's status in IHI system. 0 = Accepted, 1 = Denied, 2 = In wait, 3 = Not valid, 4 = In progress
          format: int32

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /v1/document/{ihiDocumentID}/getaccidentstatus: get: operation "Document_GetAccidentStatus": parameters: parse parameter "authHeader": all oneOf schemas must be simple types
